org.apache.karaf.jdbc

Interface JdbcService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JdbcServiceImpl

    public interface JdbcService
    JDBC Service.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        void create(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String driverName,
            java.lang.String driverClass,
            java.lang.String databaseName,
            java.lang.String url,
            java.lang.String user,
            java.lang.String password,
            java.lang.String databaseType)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a JDBC datasource configuration.
        Parameters:
        name - The datasource name.
        driverName - The backend database type (osgi.jdbc.driver.name of DataSourceFactory).
        driverClass - The JDBC driver class.
        databaseName - The database name.
        url - The JDBC URL.
        user - The database user name.
        password - The database password.
        databaseType - The database type (ConnectionPoolDataSource, XADataSource or DataSource).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the service fails.

      • delete

        void delete(java.lang.String name)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Delete a JDBC datasource identified by a name. Works only for datasources that have a corresponding configuration
        Parameters:
        name - The datasource name to delete.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the service fails.

      • factoryNames

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> factoryNames()
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        List the JDBC DataSourceFactories available.
        Returns:
        a List of DataSourceFactory names.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the service fails.

      • datasources

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> datasources()
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        List the JDBC datasources available.
        Returns:
        A List of datasources names.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the service fails.

        java.util.List<java.lang.Long> datasourceServiceIds()
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        List service IDs of JDBC datasource OSGi services available
        Returns:

        java.lang.Exception - If the service fails.

      • query

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> query(java.lang.String datasource,
                                                                       java.lang.String query)
                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Execute a SQL query on a given JDBC datasource.
        Parameters:
        datasource - The JDBC datasource name.
        query - The SQL query to execute.
        Returns:
        The SQL query result (as a Map).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the service fails.

      • tables

                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        List the tables available on a given JDBC datasource.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
